snippet: Marissa Mayer announced Monday that she had hired Henrique De Castro, a vice president at Google, as Yahoo's chief operating officer. At Google, Mr. De Castro ran advertising for Google's publisher and commerce partners. Luring advertisers to Yahoo...
abstract: Marissa Mayer announced Monday that she had hired Henrique De Castro, a vice president at Google, as Yahoo's chief operating officer. At Google, Mr. De Castro ran advertising for Google's publisher and commerce partners. Luring advertisers to Yahoo will be a top priority for the company.

headline.main: Yahoo's C.E.O., Marissa Mayer, Returns to Work With New C.O.O.
